entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Introduce parameter crashes with `ArgumentOutOfRangeException` #67932
  • Formatter doesn't correctly format usage of fluent APIs #67931
  • [Feature request]: Code folding for invocation expressions that span multiple lines #67929
  • Very slow IntelliSense on relatively small code base #67926

PullRequests

Created

  • Call `PrimaryDependency` getter once in `PENamedTypeSymbol.GetUseSiteInfo` #67927
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #67925
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Give more accurate information when we get an out of bounds error in LSP #67906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge ITextAndVersion and ITextVersionable #67847
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #67924
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Add A/B option to test if disabling 'recoverable text' helps/hurts us #67845
    Area-IDE, untriaged
